choices.name: BusinessDevelopment
choices.choiceText: Business Development

choices.name: choiceOtherKDM
choices.choiceText: Need to schedule meeting with other KDM(s)

value.stringValue: Need to schedule meeting with other KDM(s)

Flow.description: Updated Sales Group Director to assign John Schwepker to Lauren Shelvy

formulas.name: forPitchResult
formulas.expression: IF({!Update_Opportunity_Stage_to_0} = {!Proposal},'Completed Proposal', IF(AND({!Update_Opportunity_Stage_to_0} ={!BusinessDevelopment},{!Opportunity_Outcome}={!choiceEngaged}),'Completed Engaged', IF(AND({!Update_Opportunity_Stage_to_0} ={!BusinessDevelopment},{!Opportunity_Outcome}={!choiceScheduledNext}),'Completed Scheduled Next', IF(AND({!Update_Opportunity_Stage_to_0} ={!Delayed},{!Reason_Delayed}={!choiceClosedMarket}),'Completed Closed Market', IF(AND({!Update_Opportunity_Stage_to_0} ={!Delayed},{!Reason_Delayed}={!choiceWaitingList}),'Completed Waiting List', IF(AND({!Update_Opportunity_Stage_to_0} ={!Delayed},{!Reason_Delayed}={!choiceCompetitor}),'Completed Competitor', IF(AND({!Update_Opportunity_Stage_to_0} ={!Delayed},{!Reason_Delayed}={!choiceBudget}),'Completed No Budget', IF(AND({!Update_Opportunity_Stage_to_0} ={!Delayed},{!Reason_Delayed}={!choiceTooExpensive}),'Completed Too Expensive', IF(AND({!Update_Opportunity_Stage_to_0} ={!Delayed},{!Reason_Delayed}={!choiceNoInterest}),'Completed No Interest', IF(AND({!Update_Opportunity_Stage_to_0} ={!Delayed},{!Reason_Delayed}={!choiceTooMuchWork}),'Completed Too Much Work', IF(AND({!Update_Opportunity_Stage_to_0} ={!Delayed},{!Reason_Delayed}={!choiceNotKDM}),'Completed Not KDM', IF(AND({!Update_Opportunity_Stage_to_0} ={!Delayed},{!Reason_Delayed}={!choiceOther}),'Completed Other', IF(AND({!Update_Opportunity_Stage_to_0} ={!Delayed},{!Reason_Delayed}={!choiceScheduledNext}),'Completed Scheduled Next', IF(AND({!Update_Opportunity_Stage_to_0} ={!Delayed},{!Reason_Delayed}={!choiceGhosting}),'No Show', IF(AND({!Update_Opportunity_Stage_to_0} ={!Delayed},{!Reason_Delayed}={!choiceNurture}),'Completed Nurture', IF(AND({!Update_Opportunity_Stage_to_0} ={!Lost},{!Reason_Delayed_or_Lost_If_you_don_t_select_this_will_crash_0} = {!choiceLostNoShow}),'No Show', IF(AND({!Update_Opportunity_Stage_to_0} ={!Lost},{!Reason_Delayed_or_Lost_If_you_don_t_select_this_will_crash_0} = {!choiceCanceled}),'Canceled', IF(AND({!Update_Opportunity_Stage_to_0} ={!Lost},{!Reason_Delayed_or_Lost_If_you_don_t_select_this_will_crash_0} = {!ChoiceReschedule}),'Canceled', IF(AND({!Update_Opportunity_Stage_to_0} ={!Lost},{!Reason_Delayed_or_Lost_If_you_don_t_select_this_will_crash_0} = {!choiceNotaFit}),'Completed Not a Fit', 'In Process')))))))))))))))))))

formulas.name: forStartTime
formulas.expression: IF( OR( VALUE( MID( TEXT( {!Get_Pitch_Record.StartDateTime} - 6), 12, 2 ) ) = 0, VALUE( MID( TEXT( {!Get_Pitch_Record.StartDateTime} - 6), 12, 2 ) ) = 12 ), "12", TEXT( VALUE( MID( TEXT( {!Get_Pitch_Record.StartDateTime} - 6), 12, 2 ) ) - IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( {!Get_Pitch_Record.StartDateTime} - 6), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, 0, 12 ) ) ) & ":" & MID( TEXT( {!Get_Pitch_Record.StartDateTime} - 6 ), 15, 2 ) & ":" & MID( TEXT( {!Get_Pitch_Record.StartDateTime} - 6 ), 18, 2 ) & " " & IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( {!Get_Pitch_Record.StartDateTime} - 6 ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, "AM", "PM" )
